content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES
--------------------
No structures have been successfully established on the map. Multiple attempts were made to create a Lab facility at position (0.5, 2.5) for supplying Automation Science Packs toward research, but none resulted in a persistent placement. No other composite structures were created during these steps.

ERROR TIPS
----------
• Errors with get_entities API usage  
  – When retrieving entities, use the proper signature. Avoid supplying unexpected keyword arguments (such as “radius”) or extra positional parameters. Verify the function’s expected parameters before invoking it.

• Lab placement and inventory validation  
  – Before attempting to place a Lab at a designated position, confirm that a Lab exists in the inventory. This will prevent errors when attempting to place an entity that is not available.

• Handling non‐iterable results  
  – Check that the value returned from get_entities (or similar API calls) is not None before iterating over it. Implement appropriate fallbacks (e.g., an empty list) to avoid “NoneType not iterable” errors.

• Resource chain issues during Lab crafting  
  – Ensure that all required sub-ingredients (for example, iron-gear-wheels, electronic circuits, and copper cables) are producible with the available processes. Verifying the entire recipe dependency chain and confirming resource availability can help prevent crafting failures.
